title: Inflation rate in South Korea 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1998 and 1999.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 9.33 was reached at Year 1991
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.46 was reached at Year 2019

max_summary: The chart generally has many fluctuations.
The chart generally has many fluctuations.
The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
The chart generally has many fluctuations.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 1998 and 1999.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 9.33 was reached at Year 1991
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.46 was reached at Year 2019

The line rapidly increased by 134.43% from Year 1987 to 1988,decreased by 89.21% from Year 1998 to 1999,increased by 179.01% from Year 1999 to 2000,increased by 80.09% from Year 2000 to 2001,increased by 83.86% from Year 2007 to 2008,increased by 100.0% from Year 2016 to 2017, and lastly, increased by 93.48% from Year 2019 to 2020.
